mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_profile (user_id, nickname, mbti) SELECT u.user_id, u.nickname, NULL FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_user_profile p ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND p.user_id IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, nickname, mbti, created_at, updated_at FROM tb_user_profile WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user_profile SET nickname = #{nickname}, mbti = #{mbti}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, file_name, content_type, image_blob, bytes, updated_at FROM tb_user_thumbnail WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_thumbnail ( user_id, file_name, content_type, image_blob, bytes, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{fileName}, #{contentType}, #{imageBlob}, #{bytes}, NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE file_name = VALUES(file_name), content_type = VALUES(content_type), image_blob = VALUES(image_blob), bytes = VALUES(bytes), updated_at = NOW()
